Mr. David Cameron said Friday that he was "very sorry" that Mr. Andy Coulson had resigned from his government post. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government, he said. autre chose" . Andy Coulson continuera? servir David Cameron quelques semaines, le temps de trouver son successeur. Le premier ministre, qui lui t?moigne depuis le d?but un soutien sans faille, a continu de le d?fendre. Je comprends qu'Andy Coulson se sente oblig de partir en raison des pressions r?currentes sur lui et sa famille. J'en suis d?sol. Il paye deux fois pour la m?me erreur , a affirm David Cameron . Franchise tag will be part of negotiating game for players, NFL Will the Eagles be able to use the franchise tag to keep Michael Vick off the open market? I assume if the union does not believe that the franchise tag can be applied that they will challenge that through the normal process, Goodell said as he met with reporters in Arlington, Texas.
